about_the_game:
Lucy Got Problems - 18+ Adult Only Patch contains explicit uncensored sex scenes (mostly yuri/lesbian), and it also adds nudity and sexual themed dialogue to several scenes.

- Full frontal nudity (genitals are shown, uncensored)
- Lesbian sex acts, including:
1. Threesome.
2. Fingering.
3. Oral sex.
4. Groping
5. Sex with a sentient liana (skippable)
- Possibly offensive or perverted humor

Please be aware that some of the achievements can only be unlocked if you're playing the base game (no 18+) version. You can switch 18+ DLC on and off in the game "Settings" menu, with the "Steamer mode (no 18+)" option.

This DLC is only for those who are of legal age and wish to see such content. By downloading this DLC you are confirming you are 18 years of age or older (or your regional equivalent) and agree to see undressing, nudity and sexual interactions.

content_descriptors.notes: This content is for adults only. You must be of legal age in your country of residence to view this content. This DLC contains explicit uncensored sex scenes (mostly yuri/lesbian).

detailed_description:
Super special Artbook


About the Game

Lucy Got Problems - 18+ Adult Only Patch contains explicit uncensored sex scenes (mostly yuri/lesbian), and it also adds nudity and sexual themed dialogue to several scenes.

- Full frontal nudity (genitals are shown, uncensored)
- Lesbian sex acts, including:
1. Threesome.
2. Fingering.
3. Oral sex.
4. Groping
5. Sex with a sentient liana (skippable)
- Possibly offensive or perverted humor

Please be aware that some of the achievements can only be unlocked if you're playing the base game (no 18+) version. You can switch 18+ DLC on and off in the game "Settings" menu, with the "Steamer mode (no 18+)" option.

This DLC is only for those who are of legal age and wish to see such content. By downloading this DLC you are confirming you are 18 years of age or older (or your regional equivalent) and agree to see undressing, nudity and sexual interactions.
